Combat
Hit Points: 86 Armor Class: 33 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None Weapons: Elven Curve Blade (+18 1d8+5 S; dexterity; trained); Light Mace (+17 1d4+4 B; dexterity; trained); Longbow (+17 1d8 P [Crit +d10] R100'; dexterity; trained); Longsword (+17 1d8+5 S/P; strength; trained)

Toughness: +10 Hit Points
Blind-Fight: Can attack concealed foes without a prior check and hidden creatures with a DC 5 flat check/Does not suffer flat-footed vs. hidden foes/Treats adjacent undetected creatures up to level 10 as hidden instead
Elven Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon elf weapons
Point-Blank Shot: (1) Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 HP damage within the first range increment of a ranged non-volley weapon

Magic
Spell Slots: A1: 4; A2: 4; A3: 4; A4: 4; A5: 4; AC1: 5 Focus Points: 2 Attack: Arcane Innate: +17 (charisma; expert); Arcane: +17 (charisma; expert) Spell DC: Arcane Innate: 27 (charisma; expert); Arcane: 27 (charisma; expert)
Spells:
Aerial Form (A4 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium bat, bird, pterosaur, or wasp with 5 temporary HP, Armor Class 28, +16 attack, +5 damage, low-light vision, flight, +16 Acrobatics modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 5th becomes a Large creature with +10' Speed, 10 temporary HP, +18 attack, +8 damage, +20 Acrobatics; 6th becomes a Huge creature with +15' Speed, 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 31, +21 attack, +4 damage with double damage dice, +23 Acrobatics)
Black Tentacles (A5 Con): (3) R120' Successful spell attacks vs. Fortitude DC in a 20' burst inflict 3d6 HP bludgeoning and grabbed for 1 min, plus 1d6 HP bludgeoning each rd on grabbed creatures; escaping requires success vs. a DC 27 on an unarmed attack or inflicting 12 HP vs. Armor Class 27
Burning Hands (A1 Evo): (2) 15' cone inflicts 2d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Color Spray (A1 Ill): (2) 15' cone inflicts stunned 1, blinded for 1 rd, and dazzled for 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled for 1 rd only; critical success negates; critical failure extends blindness to 1 min)
Comprehend Language (A2 Div): (2) R30' Target understands a chosen heard language for 1 hr (heightened 3rd the target can also speak the language; 4th affects 10 targets)
Dancing Lights (A0 Evo): 1
Darkvision (A2 Div): (2) Allows self to see in darkness for 1 hr (heightened 3rd affects a touched target; 5th effects last until next daily prep)
Detect Magic (A0 Div): 1
Detect Magic (AC1 Div): (2) 30' emanation reveals the presence of magic and lower-level illusions (heightened 3rd reveals the school of the highest-level effect; 4th reveals the approximate location of the highest-level effect)
Dragon Breath (A3 Foc Evo): (2) 60' line inflicts 5d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Dragon Claws (A1 Foc Tra): (1) Claws inflict 1d6 HP slashing and 1d6 HP fire, and self gains resistance 5 to fire, for 1 min (heightened 5th claws inflict 2d6 HP, and self gains resistance 10; 9th claws inflict 3d6 HP, and self gains resistance 15)
Elemental Form (A5 Tra): (2) Self becomes a Medium elemental with 10 temporary HP, Armor Class 29, +18 attack, +9 damage, darkvision, +20 Acrobatics (air or fire) or Athletics (earth or water) modifier, and creature-specific features for 1 min (heightened 6th becomes a Large creature with 10' reach, 15 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +23 attack, +13 damage, +23 Acrobatics or Athletics; 7th becomes a Huge creature with 15' reach, 20 temporary HP, Armor Class 32, +25 attack, +11 damage and double damage dice, and +25 Acrobatics or Athletics)
Fear (A1 Enc): (2) R30' Inflicts frightened 2 (save Will inflicts frightened 1; critical success negates; critical failure inflicts frightened 3 and fleeing for 1 rd) (heightened 3rd affects 5 targets)
Feather Fall (A1 Abj): (R) R60' Falling target slows to 60' per rd and suffers no falling damage for 1 min or until landing
Fire Shield (A4 Evo): (2) Self gains cold resistance 5, and melee attackers suffer 2d6 HP fire, for 1 min (heightened +2 gives cold resistance +5 and inflicts +1d6 HP)
Fireball (A3 Evo): (2) R500' 20' burst inflicts 6d6 HP fire (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +2d6 HP)
Flaming Sphere (A2 Evo): (2) R30' Movable flame inflicts 3d6 HP fire in a 15' sq while sustained for up to 1 min (save basic Reflex; success negates) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Fly (A4 Tra): (2) Touched gains a fly Speed of the greater of its Speed or 20' for 5 min (heightened 7th effects last for 1 hr)
Haste (A3 Tra): (2) R30' Target gains an extra Strike or Stride action each rd for 1 min (heightened 7th affects 6 targets)
Hypnotic Pattern (A3 Ill): (2) R120' 10' burst inflicts dazzled and fascinated while sustained for up to 1 min (save Will inflicts dazzled only; critical failure inflicts loss of reactions)
Invisibility (A2 Ill): (2) Touched becomes invisible for 10 min; using a hostile action ends (heightened 4th effects last for 1 min, and a hostile action does not end the spell)
Lightning Bolt (A3 Evo): (2) 120' line inflicts 4d12 HP electricity (save basic Reflex) (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP)
Mage Armor (A1 Abj): (2) Self gains +1 Armor Class with a +5 maximum Dexterity modifier until next daily prep (heightened 4th also gives +1 saves; 6th gives +2 Armor Class; 8th gives +2 saves; 10th gives +3 Armor Class and saves)
Mage Hand (A0 Evo): 1
Magic Missile (A1 Evo): (1) R120' 1 missile (2 or 3 actions gives 2 or 3 missiles) inflicts 1d4+1 HP force (heightened +2 gives 1 additional missile per action)
Resist Energy (A2 Abj): (2) Touched gains resistance 5 vs. a specified energy type for 10 min (heightened 4th gives resistance 10 to 2 targets; 7th gives resistance 15 to 5 targets)
See Invisibility (A2 Div): (2) Self treats invisible creatures and objects as concealed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 8 hr)
Shocking Grasp (A1 Evo): (2) Touch inflicts 2d12 HP electricity; touching an armored target gives +1 attack and also inflicts 1d4 HP persistent electricity (heightened +1 inflicts +1d12 HP initial and +1 HP persistent)
Spider Climb (A2 Tra): (2) Touched gains a climb Speed equal to its Speed for 10 min (heightened 5th effects last for 1 hr)
Summon Dragon (A5 Con): (3) R30' A level 5 dragon appears and fights for self while sustained for up to 1 min (heightened +1 summons a +2 level creature)
Unseen Servant (A1 Con): (3) R60' Invisible servant with 4 Hit Points and a 30' fly Speed obeys commands to move and manipulate objects while sustained or until reduced to 0 HP
Wall Of Fire (A4 Evo): (3) R120' 5'x60'x10' line or 10' radius ring inflicts 4d6 HP fire for 1 min (heightened +1 inflicts +1d6 HP)
Magic Notes:
Advanced Bloodline (Draconic (Brass)): Knows the Dragon Breath arcane spell/+1 Focus Points
Arcane Sense: Knows the Detect Magic arcane innate spell; can cast it at 1st level at will
Bloodline Spells: Has a focus pool and 1 Focus Point
Draconic (Brass): Spell Trained (Arcane)/Knows the Dragon Claws arcane spell
Expert Spellcaster: Spell Expert (Arcane)
Bloodline Spells: Casting a bloodline or granted spell invokes a blood magic effect
Counterspell: (R) Expends a spell slot to attempt to counteract a spell with the same spell
Dangerous Sorcery: Using a spell slot to cast an instantaneous harmful spell inflicts additional damage equal to its level
Draconic (Brass): Blood magic effect gives self or a target +1 Armor Class for 1 rd
Otherworldly Magic: Can cast a chosen arcane innate cantrip at will
Signature Spells: Can heighten 1 chosen spell of each level without learning a heightened version
Sorcerer Spellcasting: Can learn spells from the arcane tradition
Notes
* +2 Armor
* +2 Amulet of Natural Armor
* +2 Ring of Protection

* +1 Elven Curve Blade
* Frost +1 Longsword: 1d6 cold damage per hit, in scabbard
* +2 Dexterity: Belt of Incredible Dexterity
Validation Errors: Blind-Fight Feat: Requires level (currently 10) >= 8 and perception rank (currently 2) >= 3
